entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
